text: The districts of Nepal ( - jillā) are the second level in the administrative subdivision of the country. There are 77 districts that are grouped in 7 provinces. Within the districts are the municipalities and the rural municipalities. ==List of districts by province== ===Koshi Province=== Districts of Nepal # Name Nepali Headquarters Geocode Population (2011) Area Website 1 Bhojpur District भोजपुर जिल्ला Bhojpur 106 182,459 1,507 km² 2 Dhankuta District धनकुटा जिल्ला Dhankuta 107 163,412 0,892 km² 3 Ilam District इलाम जिल्ला Ilam 110 290,254 1,703 km² 4 Jhapa District झापा जिल्ला Bhadrapur 111 812,650 1,606 km² 5 Khotang District खोटाँग जिल्ला Diktel 105 206,312 1,591 km² 6 Morang District मोरंग जिल्ला Biratnagar 112 965,370 1,855 km² 7 Okhaldhunga District ओखलढुंगा जिल्ला Siddhicharan 104 147,984 1,074 km² 8 Panchthar District पांचथर जिल्ला Phidim 109 191,817 1,241 km² 9 Sankhuwasabha District संखुवासभा जिल्ला Khandbari 102 158,742 3,480 km² 10 Solukhumbu District सोलुखुम्बू जिल्ला Salleri 103 105,886 3,312 km² 11 Sunsari District सुनसरी जिल्ला Inaruwa 113 763,497 1,257 km² 12 Taplejung District ताप्लेजुंग जिल्ला Taplejung 101 127,461 3,646 km² 13 Terhathum District तेह्रथुम जिल्ला Myanglung 108 113,111 0,679 km² 14 Udayapur District उदयपुर जिल्ला Gaighat 114 317,532 2,063 km² Koshi Province प्रदेश नं. १ Biratnagar 1 4,534,943 25,905 km² Madheah ===Madhesh Province=== Districts of Nepal sr.
